thread.title: School closes as virus leaves 52 kids sick (Shanghai Municipal Government)
thread.title_full: School closes as virus leaves 52 kids sick (Shanghai Municipal Government) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: School closes as virus leaves 52 kids sick (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) A primary school campus in Putuo District will be closed today as officials investigate a virus outbreak there that left 52 pupils and two of their teachers sick. The incident started on Tuesday when
